name: ufdr-copilot
description: UFDR Copilot - Secure Forensic Analysis Platform

scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.lint:backend: cd backend && (python -m flake8 . || python3 -m flake8 . || echo 'Python not available for backend linting')
scripts.format: npm run format:frontend && npm run format:backend
scripts.format:backend: cd backend && (python -m black . && python -m isort . || python3 -m black . && python3 -m isort . || echo 'Python not available for backend formatting')
